languages.text: {n}Он понижает голос и обращается к вам:{/n} "Так, значит, да? Сначала {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}наплел{mf||а} мне воодушевляющей чуши{/d} про "настоящего лидера" и побег, а теперь крутитесь как хотите? А я ведь даже тебе поверил. Впрочем, я не в обиде — сам виноват, забыл где нахожусь. Передавай от меня привет Императору".

traits.locale_text: {n}Он понижает голос и обращается к вам:{/n} "Так, значит, да? Сначала наплел{mf||а} мне воодушевляющей чуши про "настоящего лидера" и побег, а теперь крутитесь как хотите? А я ведь даже тебе поверил. Впрочем, я не в обиде — сам виноват, забыл где нахожусь. Передавай от меня привет Императору".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I see how it is. First you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}give me that inspirational crap{/d} about being a 'true leader' and escaping, and now it's everyone for themselves? I believed you, you know. Well, I won't hold it against you. I only have myself to blame for forgetting where I am. Say hello to the Emperor for me."
languages.original_text: {n}Он понижает голос и обращается к вам:{/n} "Так, значит, да? Впрочем, я не в обиде — сам виноват, забыл где нахожусь. Передавай от меня привет Императору".

languages.text: {n}彼は小さな声で言う。{/n}「なるほどな。最初は『真のリーダー』だの『脱出』だの、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}感動的な戯言{/d}を言っていたくせに、今は全員が全員のために、か？俺はあんたを信じたんだぞ。まあ、恨んだりはしない。自分の居場所を忘れてしまった自分を責めるしかないな。皇帝によろしく伝えてくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I see how it is. First you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}give me that inspirational crap{/d} about being a 'true leader' and escaping, and now it's everyone for themselves? I believed you, you know. Well, I won't hold it against you. I only have myself to blame for forgetting where I am. Say hello to the Emperor for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は小さな声で言う。{/n}「なるほどな。最初は『真のリーダー』だの『脱出』だの、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}感動的な戯言{/d}を言っていたくせに、今は全員が全員のために、か？俺はあんたを信じたんだぞ。まあ、恨んだりはしない。自分の居場所を忘れてしまった自分を責めるしかないな。皇帝によろしく伝えてくれ」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}他压低了声音，对你开了口。{/n}“我现在明白这是怎么回事了。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}你对我胡说八道{/d}，说什么要我成为‘真正的领袖’，带领大家逃跑，现在却又让每个人只顾自己？老实说，我还真是信了你的话。好吧，我不会责怪你。我只能怪我自己，因为我忘了这里是什么地方。记得替我向帝皇带个好。”
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I see how it is. First you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}give me that inspirational crap{/d} about being a 'true leader' and escaping, and now it's everyone for themselves? I believed you, you know. Well, I won't hold it against you. I only have myself to blame for forgetting where I am. Say hello to the Emperor for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}他压低了声音，对你开了口。{/n}“我现在明白这是怎么回事了。你对我胡说八道，说什么要我成为‘真正的领袖’，带领大家逃跑，现在却又让每个人只顾自己？老实说，我还真是信了你的话。好吧，我不会责怪你。我只能怪我自己，因为我忘了这里是什么地方。记得替我向帝皇带个好。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Baja la voz y te dice,{/n} «Ya veo cómo es. Primero {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}me da esa tontería inspiradora{/d} de ser un "verdadero líder" y escapar, ¿y ahora cada uno por su lado? Le creí, ¿sabe? Bueno, no se lo echaré en cara. Solo puedo culparme por olvidar dónde estoy. Salude al Emperador de mi parte».
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I see how it is. First you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}give me that inspirational crap{/d} about being a 'true leader' and escaping, and now it's everyone for themselves? I believed you, you know. Well, I won't hold it against you. I only have myself to blame for forgetting where I am. Say hello to the Emperor for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Baja la voz y te dice,{/n} «Ya veo cómo es. Primero me da esa tontería inspiradora de ser un "verdadero líder" y escapar, ¿y ahora cada uno por su lado? Le creí, ¿sabe? Bueno, no se lo echaré en cara. Solo puedo culparme por olvidar dónde estoy. Salude al Emperador de mi parte».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Er senkt die Stimme und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Ich verstehe schon. Erst tischt Ihr mir diese gequirlte Weichspülerscheiße von wegen 'wahrer Anführer' auf, redet von der Flucht ... und jetzt ist jeder auf sich allein gestellt? Ich habe Euch geglaubt, wisst Ihr? Aber na ja, ich werde es Euch nicht vorhalten. Ich bin selbst schuld, ich habe vergessen, wo ich hier bin. Grüßt den Imperator von mir."
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I see how it is. First you give me that inspirational crap about being a 'true leader' and escaping, and now it's everyone for themselves? I believed you, you know. Well, I won't hold it against you. I only have myself to blame for forgetting where I am. Say hello to the Emperor for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er senkt die Stimme und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Ich verstehe schon. Erst tischt Ihr mir diese gequirlte Weichspülerscheiße von wegen 'wahrer Anführer' auf, redet von der Flucht ... und jetzt ist jeder auf sich allein gestellt? Ich habe Euch geglaubt, wisst Ihr? Aber na ja, ich werde es Euch nicht vorhalten. Ich bin selbst schuld, ich habe vergessen, wo ich hier bin. Grüßt den Imperator von mir."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: « Je vois le genre, {n}vous dit-il dans un murmure.{/n} Vous me faites {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}tout un laïus{/d} sur ce que c'est d'être un leader et pour nous pousser à nous évader, et maintenant, c'est chacun pour soi, hein ? Je vous croyais, vous savez. Mais bon, je ne peux pas vous en vouloir. Je ne peux m'en prendre qu'à moi-même d'avoir oublié où nous étions. Saluez l'Empereur pour moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I see how it is. First you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}give me that inspirational crap{/d} about being a 'true leader' and escaping, and now it's everyone for themselves? I believed you, you know. Well, I won't hold it against you. I only have myself to blame for forgetting where I am. Say hello to the Emperor for me."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois le genre, {n}vous dit-il dans un murmure.{/n} Vous me faites {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}tout un laïus{/d} sur ce que c'est d'être un leader et pour nous pousser à nous évader, et maintenant, c'est chacun pour soi, hein ? Je vous croyais, vous savez. Mais bon, je ne peux pas vous en vouloir. Je ne peux m'en prendre qu'à moi-même d'avoir oublié où nous étions. Saluez l'Empereur pour moi. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Sesini alçaltıp sana dönüyor.{/n} "Demek böyle. Önce kalk bana 'gerçek lider' nasıl olunur diye {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}palavra sık{/d}, kurtulacağız diye umut ver; şimdi her koyun kendi bacağından mı asılıyor? Oysa sana inanmıştım. Neyse. Düştüğümüz yeri unuttuysam kabahat sende değil, bendedir. İmparator'a selamımı söylersin."
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I see how it is. First you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}give me that inspirational crap{/d} about being a 'true leader' and escaping, and now it's everyone for themselves? I believed you, you know. Well, I won't hold it against you. I only have myself to blame for forgetting where I am. Say hello to the Emperor for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısık sesle seninle konuşuyor.{/n} "Demek böyle. Önce kalk bana 'gerçek lider' nasıl olunur diye {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}palavra sık{/d}, kurtulacağız diye umut ver; şimdiyse her koyun kendi bacağından mı asılıyor? Hem de inanmıştım sana oysa. Neyse. Düştüğümüz yeri unuttuysam kabahat sende değil, bende. İmparator'a benden selam söylersin."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
